structure.unit: FINANCING OF UNIFIED STATE COURT SYSTEM

law.text: Nothing contained in KRS 32.011 to 32.070 shall be construed as limiting, restricting, or terminating the authority of local governmental units, including cities, counties, and urban-county governments, to provide financial support for the court system and the offices of the Commonwealth's attorneys which are serving that local community, and all such units of local government are further authorized to supplement the financial support provided thereto by the state under KRS 32.011 to 32.070.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 201, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1976.
